item.title: Validator for ExtJS Checkbox
item.description: Very unfortunately ExtJS doesn’t offer a validator for its checkbox component. Normally a validator checks whether a field is valid and takes care of displaying an error message if not. For a checkbox we would like that to happen if the checkbox is not selected.
